## Instructions

The assignment was to create a R script that prints all integers from 1 to 10 and a R Markdown file depicting the R code used. A HTML file will be generated. All files will be committed to the repository 'st2195_assignment_1'.

### Simple R code

There are multiple ways to write the required code. One of which is embedded below.

```{r}
print(1:10)
```

### For Loop

For loop can also be used for the assignment as shown below.

```{r}
for (x in 1:10) print(x)
```

## Conclusion

The above are possible ways to complete the assignment.
